thread.title: Proposal would erase Confederate sign from Mississippi flag

title: Proposal would erase Confederate sign from Mississippi flag
text:
Published By: Charlotte Observer - Today 
A new proposal seeks a statewide election on removing the Confederate battle emblem from the Mississippi flag. But it could be years before ...
